labels.label:
Controller Service should be define at this level and shared locally in this sub process group 

Use Parameter Context for end point url or any value that can be shared accross process group 
eg. Endpoint Elastic URL should be in param context

Input: Source Channel (Beats/HTTP)

Support Multiple Channel for a single message format.
Outcome from this process group is flowfile containing records of json 

Assign Channel related attributes here at flow file level


Output: Flow file with json records


Use the following to test your GROK Expression
https://grokconstructor.appspot.com/do/match#result

labels.label:
This example assumed that date is in jakarta timezone

therefore date conversion/formatting without timezone info will return UTC time

if no timezone, date will be converted as it is a UTC
if timezone specified, date will factor in timezone, the return the utc time from timezone adjusted input time


To Standardize:
- Use epoch time for @timestamp

Input : FlowFile with json records


Process flow file which contains multiple records with json format 

@Timestamp Conversion
Add common attribute to flow file attribute
Use Parameter Context 
Use JoltTransformRecord for transformation

Funnel Failed Record for investigation

Output : Flow File with json records

Jolt Tester:
https://jolt-demo.appspot.com/#inception

Input : Flow file with json records

Process: 
Implement exception handling and retry 
Keep failed records for investigation


Output: Target System
